archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.name: 2 - * Define TSS Employee Account
archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.documentation: Ability for TSS to change/ edit employee information such as: • Address • Phone number • Availability (start and end date) • Salary/Hourly Rate • Recovery cost (refers to the 5$/hr TSS fee) • Email address (both personal and employee suffix- if possible) • Vacation requests and dates • Skill set and proficiency level • Test scores • Resume • References • Visa documents • Which TSS staff interviewed candidate • Referrals the employee has provided • Note section b) The ability to view
